name: Games Voice Assistant
description:
Game voice assistant that can help the players play a game without hands
using voice only. Focus on helping people with disabilities.

name: Accessible Court Data
description:
Making the data more accessible and easier to visualize to get sense of the data.
Using scraping, parsing and ELK with hebrew morphology to get the best results.

name: Cost Manager Android App
description:
Manage your transaction better, visualize incomes vs expenses.
Hybrid app using MVVM design pattern with Java and jQueryMobile.
